lead_paragraph: The figure, Ibrahim Sharif, the former secretary general of the National Democratic Action Society, was convicted of inciting hatred.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Bahrain: Opposition Figure Sentenced

snippet: The figure, Ibrahim Sharif, the former secretary general of the National Democratic Action Society, was convicted of inciting hatred.
abstract: Bahraini court sentences Ibrahim Sharif, former secretary general of National Democratic Action Society, to year in prison for giving 2015 speech calling for change in kingdom.
